page.title: 14ADLINGTON STATION
page.content: Adlington station is fairly small with only about 30 regular passengers each week day.It is busiest before 8.30a.m. when businessmen travel to Manchester.25 stopping trains go to Manchester each weekday and 27 come from Manchester.Most express trains go to London taking about 2 hours.The earliest train is 6.59, the latest 23.22.The maximum speed for express trains passing is 95m.p.h.On average there are 2 stopping trains and 1 express each hour. The cost to London is (Mon.to Thurs)Â£14.50,(Fri.to Sun.)Â£19.50. The station has won 6 certificates for tidiness.It is usually repainted every 5 years. This survey was completed by Lucy Oliver,James Dowell and Jayne Hanily.
